haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Fritz Bernert
Ltn Florian Lasch
Ltn Gottlieb Grunebaum

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 20/05/1916 near Arras.
A F.E.2b of No 22 Squadron RFC was brought down by Rupert Freudenberg of Jasta 4.
Lt Harris Ferrer was killed in action.
Lt Wylie Fortey was killed in action.
Rupert Freudenberg was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 20/05/1916 near Montdidier.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.73 was brought down by Herbert Klemm of Jasta 4.
Cne Gustave Rattaire was killed in action.
Herbert Klemm was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 20/05/1916 near La Gorgue.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of No 1 Squadron RNAS was brought down by Sepp Zuber of Jasta 4.
Flt Lt Royce Hosteler was killed in action.
Sepp Zuber was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 20/05/1916 near Varennes-en-Argonne.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Simon Gans of Jasta 4.
Cpl Bernard Lafond was killed in action.
S/Lt Rene Nouvion was killed in action.
Simon Gans was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 20/05/1916 near Caumont.
A F.E.2b of Esc 64 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Fernand Mordant was killed in action.
Thierry Mourrut was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 20/05/1916 near Woimbey.
A F.E.2b of Esc 20 was brought down by Heinrich Schonborn of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Emilien de Beauchamps was killed in action.
S/Lt Jean Chevallier was killed in action.
Heinrich Schonborn was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 20/05/1916 near Aubercourt.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of No 60 Squadron RFC was brought down by Nikolaus Fechter of Jasta 4.
Lt Elliott Willis was killed in action.
Nikolaus Fechter was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 20/05/1916 near Ribecourt.
A F.E.2b of No 22 Squadron RFC was brought down by Ludwig Closterman of Jasta 4.
Cpt Quimby Milsent was killed in action.
Lt Guy Allard was killed in action.
Ludwig Closterman was  flying a Fokker E.III.


Pilots lost were: 
    Obltn Patrik Schorner: Injured
narrative:
We poounce on a group of French pushers.  I get behinfd and below one of them and fire.  The Frenchman takes evasive action and the fighht is on.  I fire into  the cockpit and kill the pilot.  As the plane begins to sspin down the observer gets a clean shot.  He hit me and my engine.  I nudge the Fokker towards a town and land just outside of it. My injuries cost me a month at the front.  

In my absence Immelman is lost. Kurt Wintgens has joined our squadron,
